thread.title: Great Location,Very clean & comfortable
thread.title_full: Great Location,Very clean & comfortable - Review of Median Paris Porte de Versailles, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Vickie V
title: Great Location,Very clean & comfortable
text:
We loved staying at this hotel. The staff was very welcoming and hospitable, it was clean, comfortable, updated and right across the street from public transportation. We found this to be great for first time visitors, we were able to get anywhere in Paris on the metro. The breakfast was good.
I would definitely recommend this hotel. Ali, Natalie, and the entire staff were superb!!
